src:
36-letnika na plaži raztrgala zver
Medvedka je imela dva mladiča.
04 Nov 2019, 20:42 by N. B.
KURILSK – Devet dni po tem, ko ga je med nabiranjem rakcev na plaži na enem izmed otokov Kurilskega otočja napadla medvedka, je v bolnišnici umrl Aleksej Ivanovski (36). Nesrečniku je zver med drugim dobesedno odtrgala del zadnjice, lasišča in hrbta, ostal je tudi brez enega ušesa.Medvedka je po poročanju prič imela dva mladiča. Ko je napadla Alekseja, so prisotni vanjo začeli metati vse, kar jim je prišlo pod roke, a neuspešno. Aleksej je bil takoj po napadu že klinično mrtev, a so ga reševalci uspešno oživili. Z letalom so ga odpeljali v domači kraj, kjer pa je v bolnišnici umrl zaradi posledic srčnega infarkta.
text:
The 36-year-old was torn apart by a beast on the beach
The bear had two puppies.
04 Nov 2019, 20:42 by N.B.
KURILSK - Nine days after a bear was attacked by a bear while on the beach in one of the Kuril Islands, Alexei Ivanovski, 36, died at the hospital. Among other things, the beast literally tore off part of the buttocks, scalp and back, leaving the beast without one ear. The bear reportedly had two puppies. When she attacked Alexei, those present began throwing everything at their hands, but to no avail. Alexei was already clinically dead immediately after the attack but was successfully resuscitated by paramedics. He was taken to his hometown by plane, where he died in hospital due to a heart attack.
